description: Professional services for the GCdocs project
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Professional Services for the GCdocs Project

## Contract Announcement Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-29-98845103
* **Solicitation Number:** 202402100
* **Publication Date:** 2024-02-28
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2024-03-14, 14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-04-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-06-30

## Description of Work

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires professional services for the GCdocs project, including Application/Software Architect and Tester resources to support the technical solution of the project.

## Pre-qualification Requirements

To be eligible, bidders must be invited TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region (NCR) for the following categories:

* A.1 Application/Software Architect (3 consultants)
* A.11 Tester (2 consultants)

## Security Requirements

* The tendering process will be secured with the RCMP's customized SRCL 102962.
* A minimum security level of Secret is required for the resources.

## Invitation to Bid

The RCMP has invited 15 qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the tender.

## Contact Information

For inquiries and proposals, please contact:

* Name: Stacy Seme
* Email: stacy.seme@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 574-7219

## Important Notice

* Canada will make available all procurement notices, bid solicitations, and related documents for download through the GETS platform.
* Bidders are responsible for regularly consulting the GETS platform for the most up-to-date information.
* Public services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) will handle procurement-related inquiries.

Note: I removed some unnecessary information and rephrased the text to make it more professional and concise, within the 400-word limit. I also ensured that all relevant details were included. Let me know if you have any further requests!
